access: Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knight's Tabard](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1556)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 86</row>

**Price** 15 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This cloth vestment features the heraldry or symbol associated with an entity (such as a deity, kingdom, or organization). Knights typically wear it over armor and other clothing, helping them identify allies on the battlefield or distinguishing themselves in more peaceful situations. An individual wearing a tabard gains a +1 item bonus to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on creatures who have a positive association with the entity represented on the tabard.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
